glsa.title: DBD::mysql: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in DBD::mysql, the worst of which might allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface (DBI)

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in DBD::mysql. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition, execute arbitrary code, or have other unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All DBD::mysql users should upgrade to the latest version:
